flavorText:
"Has your peaceful nature led you on a crusade?"
—Watnik, master glassblower

foreignData.flavorText: „Hat dich dein friedliches Wesen auf einen Kreuzzug entsandt?" —Watnik, Glasbläsermeister

foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, Opfere das Sonnengras-Ei: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G}{W}. Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.text: {2}, {T}, sacrificar el Huevo Hierbasol: Agrega {G}{W} a tu reserva de maná. Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Votre nature paisible vous a-t-elle conduit à une guerre sacrée ? » —Warnik, maître souffleur de verre.

foreignData.flavorText: "Tua natureza pacífica te levou a uma cruzada?" — Watnik, mestre vidreiro
foreignData.name: Ovo de Sungrass

name: Sungrass Egg
originalText:
o2, oc
T, Sacrifice Sungrass Egg: Add o
Go
W to your mana pool. Draw a card.

rulings.text: This is a mana ability, which means it can be activated as part of the process of casting a spell or activating another ability. If that happens you get the mana right away, but you don’t get to look at the drawn card until you have finished casting that spell or activating that ability.

text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Sungrass Egg: Add {G}{W}. Draw a card.
